definition: throwing weapon/dart/goods sent under the protection of an armed escort

sentences.english: Every county where there is a peasant movement has a rapidly growing spear corps.
sentences.chinese: 凡有农民运动各县，梭镖队便迅速地发展。

sentences.english: He is more like a spear than(like) anything else.
sentences.chinese: 与其说他像别的东西，不如说更像梭镖。

sentences.english: A spear went through the body of Stockard's wife.
sentences.chinese: 一只梭镖穿透斯多卡德的老婆。

sentences.english: They tremble at the sight of the peasants' spears.
sentences.chinese: 他们看见农民的梭镖就发抖。

sentences.english: He began moving quickly toward me with the spear.
sentences.chinese: 他拿着梭镖快速地朝我冲了过来。

sentences.english: He is more like a spear than anything else.
sentences.chinese: 与其说他像别的东西，不如说更像梭镖。

sentences.english: A new way is through the setting up of spear corps under the peasant associations.
sentences.chinese: 建设农民武装另有一个新的方面，即农会的梭镖队。

definition: variant of 梭鏢|梭镖[suo1 biao1]
ancient spear-like weapon, decorated with a red tassel
